page.title: 18VILLAGE HALL
page.content: Is owned by Church Council (not diocese) formerly Church school; closed l925. Last teacher was Miss Kiddy: salary Â£5 p.a. Used as canteen for servicemen camped in neighbouring fields during 2nd World War. The hall is now used increasingly for local village events, both social and business - dances, discos, concerts, parish council meetings, Over 60s club meetings, W.I. meetings and is available for general hire - Â£4.50 morning/afternoon events: Â£10 evening events. It has been main focal point for village activities since the closure of the village's only public house - The Griffin - in the l920s. The former teacher's cottage attached to the hall is now occupied by the hall caretaker - Miss Elsie Gunn who has lived in the village all her life.
